values: 主办方；主办国（或城市、机构）；东道主；主人；宿主；寄主；（接受移植组织的）受体；大量；众多；许多；群体；（计算机网络的）主机；服务机；主办地；（电视或广播的）节目主持人；（Host）圣体；圣饼；祭品；祭饼；圣餐面包
主持（活动、电视、广播节目等）；招待（客人）；做东；寄存数据；寄存网站；容纳（微生物、寄生虫等）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 招待周到地；亲切地；善于款待地
女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东

word_group.brief_definition: 主人家庭；寄宿家庭；接待家庭
主机名；主机名称；主机的名称
目的主机；目标主机；地主机
乙系列问题；许多问题；大量问题
游戏节目主持人；电玩节目主持人
项目主持人；节目主持人

bilingual.source: We need to upgrade the host system to improve performance.
bilingual.target: 我们需要升级主机系统以提高性能。

bilingual.source: This software can only run on a specific host system.
bilingual.target: 这个软件只能在特定的主机系统上运行。

bilingual.source: The host system is responsible for managing all hardware resources.
bilingual.target: 主机系统负责管理所有的硬件资源。

bilingual.source: When the host system fails, the entire network is affected.
bilingual.target: 主机系统出现故障时，整个网络都会受到影响。

bilingual.source: Can you help me check the configuration of the host system?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我检查一下主机系统的配置吗？

bilingual.source: The hypervisor allows multiple operating systems to run on a single hardware host.
bilingual.target: 虚拟机监控程序允许多个操作系统在单一硬件主机上运行。

bilingual.source: We still see user@ host as the standard for email addresses now.
bilingual.target: 我们现在仍然将用户@主机视为电子邮件地址的标准。

bilingual.source: Choose the host blade2 as the initial host.
bilingual.target: 选择主机blade2作为初始主机。

bilingual.source: The transport layer is also called the host-to-host layer.
bilingual.target: 传输层也称为主机到主机层。

bilingual.source: Example: host NAT box running a backup MX host.
bilingual.target: 例如: 主机在NAT后并做为了备份MX主机.

list.abstract: host，英语单词，作名词用时表示主人、东道主；旅馆老板；节目主持人；寄主、宿主； 主机；一大群、许多；军队；圣体。作及物动词时表示作。..主人（或东道主）主办、主持；以主人身份招待。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, he's a retired kids show host.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别在意了，他就是个退休的儿童节目主持人而已。

yingyinNormal.en: That certainly helps explain Clementine, the host we retired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就能解释克莱门汀的事了，我们撤掉的那个接待员。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean the guy who used to host that lame kids show?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说那个主持白痴儿童节目的人吗？

yingyinNormal.en: If we do not reduce our population ourselves, there's only two ways it can go: The host kills the virus, or the virus kills the host. Either way…
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不减少人口，就只有两种后果：宿主杀了病毒，或者病毒杀了宿主。两者之一……

yingyinNormal.en: As night falls the mighty Lan Cang River is host to one final ritual.
yingyinNormal.zh: 夜幕降临，澜沧江迎来了最后的仪式。

yingyinNormal.en: I found the Great Khan's brother to be a gracious host, as Prince Jingim reported.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如真金王子所说，大汗的兄弟待人极为热情。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'm doing this telethon thing on TV and my agent got me a job as co-host. Oh that's great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要上马拉松式电视节目，我的经纪帮我争取当主持群。太棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't say, Tolstoy? Pushkin. "A deception that elevates us is dearer than a host of low truths."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜猜，托尔斯泰吗？普希金，"升华友谊的谎言要好过一堆无用的事实"。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Monica's been working hard all day. She didn't want to host in the first place. We shouldn't go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫尼卡为了做晚饭忙了一整天，她最初也不想主持晚餐的，我们不该去的。

yingyinNormal.en: Host that went missing is the woodcutter. Looks like the rest of them got stuck here waiting for supper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 失踪的正是负责劈木头的接待员，其他人似乎就困在这里等着吃晚餐。

yingyinNormal.en: The only thing that could save her is flying. But that power comes with its own host of scientific issues.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这时只有会飞才能救她。但随之而来的是一系列与其相关的重要科学问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no, I can't go. I'm practicing; I got an audition to be the host of a new game show. Oh cool. That's great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能去，我在练习，我要参加新游戏节目主持人的试镜。酷啊。太棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: Lawyer, senator, CEO, scientist, physicist, winners of Nobel and Pulitzer Prizes, or late night talk show host.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可能成为律师，参议员，首席执行官，科学家，物理学家，诺贝尔奖及普利策奖得主，乃至深夜谈话节目主持人。

yingyinNormal.en: For your information, I'll be playing host to Dr. Elizabeth Plimpton. The cosmological physicist from Princeton?
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉你们，我将接待伊丽莎白·普林顿博士。普林斯顿大学的宇宙物理学家？

yingyinNormal.en: Every host needs a backstory, Bernard. You know that. The self is a kind of fiction, for hosts and humans alike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每位接待员都需要一个背景故事，伯纳德，你懂的，对于所有和人类极为相似的接待员来说，自体就是一种虚构。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I would not characterize this as normal host behavior. Yet you're describing it as within normal parameters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不会把这归为正常的接待员行为。但你将之描述成符合正常范围的。

yingyinNormal.en: I've identified the host as general Zod of Kandor. Acknowledging presence of foreign genetic material. Analyzing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已辨认出基因主人为坎多城的佐德将军。正在确认外来基因物质。正在分析。

yingyinNormal.en: But I could be a game-show host forever like that Bob Barker guy. He's been doing The Price is Right for 75 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我可以一辈子当游戏节目主持人，就像巴伯贝克，他主持猜价游戏75年。

yingyinNormal.en: But this equipment. This is newer. Slower than our machines back at the Mesa, but it will render a host in a few days.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这个仪器。这是年代更新，比我们在梅萨的机器慢些，但它花几天还是能造出一个接待员。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, tomorrow happens to be the longest day of the year. Prince wants to celebrate it, host a party, tomorrow afternoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天刚好是夏至日，王子想明天下午举办派对，庆祝一翻。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主持; 主办; 主持人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女主人；女招待；女服务员；女主持

word_family.mean: n. 主人；寄主；宿主；接受移植组织的受体；主机；生存地；许多人；圣体；主办方；主办地

examination_example.sentence: We must remember further that <highlight>hosts</highlight> of plays have been lost, and that probably there is no author of note whose entire work has survived.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须牢记许多戏剧都已经丢失了，而且我们也要牢记可能没有任何一个著名作家的全部作品完全保留下来。

examination_example.sentence: Besides helping you feel close and connected to people, it turns out that hugs can bring a <highlight>host</highlight> of health benefits to your body and mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了能让你感觉与人亲密、有联系外，它还能给你的身心带来很多健康方面的益处。

examination_example.sentence: Newton's laws of motion and Darwinian evolution each bind a <highlight>host</highlight> of different phenomena into a single explicatory framework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 牛顿的运动定律和达尔文的进化论都是把很多不同现象纳入到一个单独框架来解释。

sense_info_list.en: provide the space and other things necessary for a special event
sense_info_list.zh: 主持; 主办; 主持人

examination_example.sentence: Simply arranging a meeting, making a phone call, or <highlight>hosting</highlight> an event is not an "official act."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅安排会面，打个电话，主持一项活动不能算“公务行为”。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose your university is going to <highlight>host</highlight> a summer camp for high school students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你的大学将主办一个高中生夏令营。

examination_example.sentence: You are going to <highlight>host</highlight> a club reading session.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你将主持一个俱乐部读书会。

word_usage.usage: host作名词，表示“大量；许多”时，常与介词of连用，其后一般接复数名词，如：a host of possibilities 许多可能性。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Universities around the world were among the first to connect to this new medium, which <highlight>hosted</highlight> discussion groups, informative personal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界各地的大学是第一批连接到这种新媒体的，它主持讨论小组，提供个人信息。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, if the <highlight>host</highlight> casually acknowledges that there is a camera in the room by telling a story about it, that may be enough to provide an opening for a guest to say if they are uncomfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，如果主人通过讲述一个关于摄像头的故事随意地承认房间里有一个摄像头，这可能足以让客人说出他们是否感到不舒服。

sense_info_list.en: provide the space and other things necessary for a special event
sense_info_list.zh: 主持; 主办; 主持人

examination_example.sentence: In a multi-state study of assisted living , for instance, University of North Carolina researchers found that a <highlight>host</highlight> of variables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在一项关于辅助生活的多州研究中，北卡罗来纳大学的研究人员发现了许多变量。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女主人；女招待；女服务员；女主持

word_family.mean: n. 主人；寄主；宿主；接受移植组织的受体；主机；生存地；许多人；圣体；主办方；主办地

sense_info_list.en: provide the space and other things necessary for a special event

examination_example.sentence: Most universities <highlight>host</highlight> welcome events before the academic year officially begins, including freshmen orientations (迎新会), campus picnics, and entertainments like concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大学在学年正式开始前都会举办欢迎活动，包括新生迎新会、校园野餐和音乐会等娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: All these stadiums are still functional, still open and still <highlight>hosting</highlight> the biggest events in world sport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些体育场馆仍在使用，仍在开放，仍在举办世界体育界最大的赛事。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>host</highlight> big games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们主持大型比赛。

examination_example.sentence: How do you know the <highlight>host</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你怎么认识主人的？

examination_example.sentence: Make sure that the tourism provides positive experiences for both the visitors and the <highlight>hosts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保旅游业为游客和主人提供积极的体验。

examination_example.sentence: If you're the <highlight>host</highlight>, you can ask them to help you in the kitchen with something and just remove them from the situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你是主人，你可以让他们在厨房里帮你做一些事情，然后把他们从这种情况下带走。

examination_example.sentence: I'd love to <highlight>host</highlight> you here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很愿意在这里招待你们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女主人；女招待；女服务员；女主持

word_family.mean: n. 主人；寄主；宿主；接受移植组织的受体；主机；生存地；许多人；圣体；主办方；主办地

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 主人家庭；寄宿家庭；接待家庭

examination_example.sentence: Li worked as a wedding <highlight>host</highlight> to make a living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Li是靠做婚礼主持人来维持生计的。

examination_example.sentence: After greetings, the gift should be passed immediately to the <highlight>host</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问候之后，礼物应该立即送出给主人。

examination_example.sentence: I will never forget the days I spent with my <highlight>host</highlight> family in Britain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我永远不会忘记我在英国的寄宿家庭中生活的日子。

examination_example.sentence: Lindsay's recording really worked and she was asked to <highlight>host</highlight> the Sunday breakfast show.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Lindsay的录音很成功，她被邀请主持周日的早餐节目。

examination_example.sentence: Beijing will be the first city to host both summer and winter Games in the world after it <highlight>hosted</highlight> the 2008 summer Olympics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 继2008年夏季奥运会之后，北京将成为世界上第一个同时举办过夏季和冬季奥运会的城市。

examination_example.sentence: Paris will <highlight>host</highlight> (举办) the Olympic Games in 2024 and Los Angeles in 2028.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎将于2024年举办奥运会，洛杉矶将于2028年举办。

examination_example.sentence: Person to person network email was born and user@ <highlight>host</highlight> became the standard for email addresses, as it remains today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人际网络电子邮件诞生了，用户@主机成为了电子邮件地址的标准，正如今天所见的那样。

examination_example.sentence: We still see user@ <highlight>host</highlight> as the standard for email addresses now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在仍然将用户@主机视为电子邮件地址的标准。

examination_example.sentence: I used the "@" sign to show that the user was "at"some other <highlight>hosts</highlight> (电脑主机) rather than being local.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我用“@”符号来表示用户“在”其他主机，而不是本地主机。
